Description: Rectangular limestone stela bearing a representation of the deceased and four columns of Hieroglyphs.
Curator's comments: Stela from Abydos cenotaph of Bembu and Nebsenet, ANOC 65.1. Published: PM V: p. 96.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 3. (pl.34)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rt Hon Russell Rea
